Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Nitobi.AddButtonItemA grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard add row button in the grid toolbar
Nitobi.AjaxGetDataHandlerEventArgsProvided during an Ajax get data request and contains all the information provided by the javascript control about what data is needed
Nitobi.AjaxRequestTypesDefines public static int data elements that specifies the type of ajax event taking place
Nitobi.AjaxSaveDataHandlerEventArgsProvided during a Grid Ajax save data event and contains the data modified by the user in the grid
Nitobi.BaseCalendarEventDefines all of the know properties that can be specified for a calendar event. The data source the calendar is bound to for its events could be a list of these objects, but isnt required
Nitobi.BaseEntityThe top parent class for all inner elements of the Nitobi ASP.NET controls. This class helps to write very simple XML output of its children, and can also recreate a tree of its child classes from XML
Nitobi.BaseTreeNodeDefines all of the know properties that can be specified for a tree node. The data source the tree is bound to for its events could be a list of these objects, but isnt required
Nitobi.BoundColumnSpecifies that the column is bound to a specific field from the data source providing the rows of data. When the column is being used to help generate the Nitobi compressed XML for the control, it will use the data with the given DataField name for the value of each row
Nitobi.ButtonCallout
Nitobi.ButtonItemRepresents a single button in the Grid's toolbar area. New buttons can be added to the toolbar by defining one of these or its child classes within the grid toolbar's items element
Nitobi.ButtonSpotlight
Nitobi.CalendarDisplays a drop down calendar that allows a user to either type in a date, or pick one from the month style drop down calendar
Nitobi.CalendarEventsThis is the inner element for the calendar control's client side events, allowing the developer to specify javascript to be executed with the various calendar events occur
Nitobi.Callout
Nitobi.CalloutStep
Nitobi.CheckboxColumnUsed only by the Grid control, allows the user to edit the value of the row data by changing the checked value of a standard checkbox
Nitobi.CmnA collection of static methods to assist in various tasks that are used by the rest of the classes in this library
Nitobi.CodeStep
Nitobi.ColumnThe base class of all column types in the library. All ColumnControlBase type controls have a collection of columns that specify the data they will use and if applicable the actual columns for the control
Nitobi.ColumnClientEventsUsed for the Grid only, columns can have client events specified for them that can have javascript written for them. Each of the events defined in this class is for javascript code snippents
Nitobi.ColumnControlBaseAn abstract base class for controls that use rows of data for their displays. Child classes include the Grid, Combo, Tree and Calendar child classes
Nitobi.ColumnListColumnServers as the abstract base class for columns that can have child columns within them such as the ComboColumn and CheckboxColumn
Nitobi.ColumnsEntityThis is the root contain for a collection of columns and is used by all ColumnControlBase child classes to manage their columns
Nitobi.ComboRepresents a control that allows a user to either select a single item from a drop down list or to search for items within a list by keying in a value and the list apearing with matches to choose from
Nitobi.ComboClientEvents
Nitobi.ComboColumnUsed only by grid control, allows the user to edit the value of the row data by showing a drop down of possible choices for them to use
Nitobi.ComboList
Nitobi.ComboTextBox
Nitobi.CurrentPageItemA grid toolbar item that will show the current page being viewed by the user when the grid is being used in a paging mode. As the user navigates through the pages of grid data, this value will change
Nitobi.DateColumnWhen used in the Grid control, allows the user to edit the date in the column by either typing a properly formatted date in the edit field or by using the drop down calendar button to pick a date. All other ColumnControlBase child classes can use this column for read only formatted dates
Nitobi.DeleteButtonItemA grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard delete row button in the grid toolbar
Nitobi.ExpandColumnUsed only by the Grid, this column indicates that the grid will have child grids that can be shown for each row by open the expandor graphic
Nitobi.FisheyeDisplays a horizontal list of icons that will grow to a larger size as the mouse gets closer to it, reaching its largest size when the mouse is within the image. This control mimics the desktop toolbar from Apple OS X
Nitobi.FisheyeItem
Nitobi.FormHelperStep
Nitobi.GeneralDataProvider
Nitobi.Grid
Nitobi.GridClientEvents
Nitobi.GridToolbarUsed by the Grid control to customize the elements used in its toolbar
Nitobi.GridToolbarItemThis is the abstract base class for all items that are to be shown within the grid toolbar
Nitobi.HyperLinkColumnWhen used in the Grid control, will show an anchor in the column and the raw value is expected to be a valid URL to the location to navigate to when the user clicks the link. For all other ColumnControlBase child classes the raw URL would be displayed with no anchor
Nitobi.IColumnCollection
Nitobi.IDataProvider
Nitobi.ImageColumnSpecifies that the column will be showing an image rather than the actual text data. Data values from the rows should be the URL to the image
Nitobi.IRowDefines the generic interface for a row of data when a nitobi control is sending back rows of data in an Ajax request
Nitobi.KeyColumnSpecifies the row's key value and its mapping into the data source. This column is never displayed in the control, and is used to generate the compressed XML's xk attribute. See the XmlDataHandler class documentation for more details about the format of the Nitobi compressed XML
Nitobi.LabelItemA grid toolbar item that will display simple html within the grid toolbar
Nitobi.LateBindingDataRowImplements the IRow interface by binding to a .NET object and using .NET reflection to get property values based on the fieldName provided
Nitobi.MaskColumnAbstract base class for columns that have a mask attribute, such as the NumberColumn and DateColumn
Nitobi.MenuItem
Nitobi.MouseStep
Nitobi.NextPageButtonItemA grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard next page button in the grid toolbar
Nitobi.NitobiControlBase
Nitobi.NumberColumnWhen used in the Grid control, allows the user to edit the number in the column. All other ColumnControlBase child classes can use this column for read only formatted numbers
Nitobi.PagingInfoItemA grid toolbar item that will show the current page and total pages available formatted within the context of an html template provided in the Text property
Nitobi.PrevPageButtonItemA grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard previous page button in the grid toolbar
Nitobi.RefreshButtonItemA grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard refresh button in the grid toolbar
Nitobi.RequestDataRowImplements the IRow interface by getting its values from the HTTP Request using the provided fieldName
Nitobi.RowCountItemA grid toolbar item that will show the number of rows known to be in the grid
Nitobi.SaveButtonItemA grid toolbar item that will put the Grid's standard save button in the grid toolbar
Nitobi.ScriptingBaseEntity
Nitobi.ScriptOnlyControlBase
Nitobi.SeparatorItemA grid toolbar item that will display a seperator bar between its sibling items in the toolbar
Nitobi.Spotlight
Nitobi.SpotlightStep
Nitobi.TabAutoSize
Nitobi.TabItemMaintains the state for each tab in the tab strip and can be created by ASP.NET when embedding the <csf:TabItem> in the tabstrip control in an ASPX/ASCX
Nitobi.TabStrip
Nitobi.TabStripClientEvents
Nitobi.TemplateColumnGiven an HTML template, will create a value for the XML to the control that can combine several fields from the data source into a custom formatted value
Nitobi.TextColumnDefines a column that can be edited with either a textbox, multi-line text field or a password field
Nitobi.TotalPagesItemA grid toolbar item that will show the total number of pages of data there are for the user to page through when using the grid in one of the paging modes. This number will only be accurate if the Grid's data provider has an implementation of the getTotalDataSize
Nitobi.TotalRowsInfoItemA grid toolbar item that will show the total row count available formatted within the context of an html template provided in the Text property
Nitobi.Tree
Nitobi.XmlDataHandlerThis is the main class for providing data for all of the Nitobi controls that bind to rows of data in a data source
Nitobi.XmlDataIslandAn ASP.NET control to render an xml data island that will contain the Nitobi compressed XML used as a datasource for other Nitobi controls
Nitobi.XmlDataRowImplements the IRow interface by gettings values from a System.Xml.XmlElement object using the provided fieldName
Nitobi.YouTubeCallout
